Package lib.async

Class PackageVerticle

java.lang.Object
io.vertx.core.AbstractVerticle
lib.async.PackageVerticle
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.vertx.core.Verticle
public class PackageVerticle extends io.vertx.core.AbstractVerticle
Class that manage package analysis. It extends from AbstractVerticle and when the verticle is deployed start the analysis with parameter passed in constructor.
See Also:
  • AbstractVerticle

  • Constructor Details

    • PackageVerticle

      public PackageVerticle(AsyncProjectAnalyzer analyzer, io.vertx.core.Promise<PackageReport> promise, String srcPackagePath, Logger logger)
      Class constructor
      Parameters:
      analyzer - analyzer to use
      promise - promise where PackageReport where will be present
      srcPackagePath - path to package to analyze
      logger - logger used to send message during analysis

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Start execution of the verticle. Analyze the package found at the path set in the constructor and complete the Future also passed in the Constructor with the results of the analysis as a PackageReport.
      Overrides:
      start in class io.vertx.core.AbstractVerticle

    • stop

      public void stop() throws Exception
      Stop the verticle execution and set the Promise as failed with an explication message.
      Overrides:
      stop in class io.vertx.core.AbstractVerticle
      Throws:
      Exception - - Throws an execution if Vertx fail to stop this verticle. Check Vertx documentation for more information.
